title: User Registration with Email and Password
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register using email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Enter valid email, password, and required profile information
Submit the registration form
Check that user registration is successful and user is redirected to dashboard

title: Login via Google OAuth
description: Verify that a user can log in using Google OAuth authentication.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Select Login with Google option
Complete Google OAuth flow with valid account
Verify user is logged in and redirected to dashboard

title: Password Reset Functionality
description: Verify that users can reset their password using email authentication.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Click on 'Forgot Password' link
Enter registered email and submit request
Verify reset email is sent
Follow reset link and enter new password
Verify password is updated and user can login with new password

title: Real-Time Environmental Data Display
description: Verify real-time environmental monitoring dashboard displays latest sensor data and updates within 1 second.

steps.description: Login and navigate to environmental monitoring dashboard
Verify real-time data from multiple sensors is displayed in charts and graphs
Verify data updates within 1 second of sensor data changes

title: Alert System for Abnormal Sensor Readings
description: Ensure alerts are generated and displayed when sensor data exceeds defined thresholds.

steps.description: Simulate abnormal sensor data beyond threshold value
Verify alert notification is generated and visible in dashboard
Verify alert includes sensor location and abnormal parameter details

title: Historical Environmental Data Comparison
description: Verify users can view and compare historical environmental data with current readings.

steps.description: Navigate to sensor data page
Select a historical time range for comparison
Verify data visualization updates to show historical comparison graphs

title: Interactive Map with Sensor Locations
description: Verify interactive map displays sensor locations correctly, supports filtering, and updates in real-time.

steps.description: Open monitoring map page
Verify all sensor markers are visible on the map with correct locations
Apply filters (e.g., sensor types, pollution levels)
Verify that only filtered sensor markers are shown
Simulate sensor data changes
Verify map updates in real-time to reflect data changes

title: AI-Powered Analytics Insight Generation
description: Check that AI analytics generate insights and predictions based on environmental data.

steps.description: Navigate to AI analytics dashboard
Request AI insights for selected sensor data set
Verify insights and predictive trends are generated and displayed

title: Recommendation System for Environmental Interventions
description: Verify AI-based recommendations are provided for environmental policy interventions and scenario modeling.

steps.description: Access recommendations section
Input different policy scenarios for modeling
Verify recommendations update according to scenarios

title: Community Forum Post Creation and Interaction
description: Verify users can create posts, comment, and participate in community challenges.

steps.description: Navigate to community forum
Create a new post with valid content
Verify post is visible in forum
Comment on an existing post
Verify comment is displayed correctly
Join a community environmental challenge
Verify participation is recorded and displayed in leaderboard

title: Emergency Alert Creation and Notification
description: Verify emergency responders can create emergency alerts and notifications propagate in real-time.

steps.description: Login as emergency responder
Create a new emergency alert with relevant details
Verify alert is displayed in all connected users' dashboards in real-time

title: Emergency Response Team Coordination Tools
description: Check that emergency responders can coordinate teams and communicate effectively during a crisis.

steps.description: Access emergency response coordination panel
Assign users to response teams
Send messages via crisis communication tools
Verify team assignments and messages are visible to all relevant team members

title: User Profile Creation and Editing
description: Verify users can create profile upon registration and edit profile information.

steps.description: Register a new user and login
Navigate to profile page
Update profile fields (e.g., name, preferences)
Verify profile updates are saved and displayed correctly

title: Notification Settings Management
description: Verify users can configure notification preferences and receive alerts accordingly.

steps.description: Go to notification settings
Enable/disable different types of notifications
Verify notifications are received or blocked according to preferences

title: System Performance under Load
description: Verify that the application maintains acceptable performance metrics under high concurrency (1000+ users).

steps.description: Simulate 1000+ concurrent users accessing key features
Verify average page load times remain under 3 seconds
Verify API response times are under 500ms
Verify real-time updates are received within 1 second

title: Data Encryption Validation
description: Verify that data at rest and in transit is encrypted using AES-256 standard.

steps.description: Inspect data storage in database for encryption at rest
Monitor network traffic during data transmission
Verify encryption using AES-256 standard is applied

title: OAuth 2.0 and JWT Authentication Security
description: Verify authentication mechanisms are secure and JWT tokens are properly issued and verified.

steps.description: Perform login via OAuth 2.0
Verify JWT token is issued with valid claims
Use invalid/expired token to access protected API
Verify access is denied for invalid tokens

title: API Rate Limiting and CORS Enforcement
description: Verify API endpoints enforce rate limiting and restrict cross-origin requests appropriately.

steps.description: Send multiple rapid API requests exceeding rate limits
Verify API returns proper error code for rate limiting
Send API request from unauthorized origin
Verify CORS policy blocks unauthorized requests

title: Responsive Design Verification
description: Verify the user interface renders and functions correctly on mobile, tablet, and desktop screen sizes.

steps.description: Open application on desktop browser
Verify UI elements are displayed correctly and are usable
Resize window to tablet dimensions
Verify UI adjusts layout properly
Open application on mobile device or emulator
Verify all features are accessible and usable

title: Accessibility Compliance Testing
description: Verify UI meets WCAG 2.1 accessibility requirements including keyboard navigation and screen reader support.

steps.description: Navigate through all major UI screens using keyboard only
Verify all interactive elements are reachable and operable
Test UI with screen reader software
Verify all content is described properly and usable

title: Session Management and Timeout
description: Verify user sessions are managed securely and expire appropriately after inactivity.

steps.description: Login and remain inactive until session timeout
Verify user is logged out and redirected to login page after timeout
Attempt to use expired session token to access protected pages
Verify access is denied

title: Export Environmental Data Functionality
description: Verify users can export filtered or selected environmental monitoring data correctly.

steps.description: Apply filters to sensor data (dates, types)
Select export option and choose export format
Verify file is downloaded containing correct filtered data

title: Custom Report Generation
description: Verify AI analytics allows generation of custom reports and exports them correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to report generation feature in analytics dashboard
Configure report parameters (data range, metrics, predictions)
Generate report
Verify report is generated and exportable in supported formats

title: Activity and Achievement Tracking
description: Verify user's activity history is recorded and achievement badges are awarded appropriately.

steps.description: Perform community interactions like posting and joining challenges
Navigate to user profile activity and achievement section
Verify actions appear in activity history and relevant achievements are shown

title: Backup and Disaster Recovery
description: Verify daily backups are performed and data can be recovered from backup successfully.

steps.description: Check automated backup logs for last 7 days
Perform data recovery from a backup snapshot
Verify data is restored correctly without loss or corruption
